text: Zvirokwazvo, avo vasingatendi ndeavo vanoti: “Allah ndeumwe wevatatu (mwari baba, mwari mwanakomana, uye mwari mweya mutsvene).” Asi hakuna mumwe mwari (anekodzero yokunamatwa) kunze kwaMwari mumwechete (Allah). Uye vakasasiya izvo zvavanotaura, zvirokwazvo, marwadzo makuru achavawana avo vasingatendi mukati mavo
